边边		辺edge, margin, side, border
  • go 辶to see that which is usually far away 臱: the border
  • ⓢ army going ⻌ to the border to show in force 力 or with a sword 刀

(Simplified: 边)
Pictophonetic: 臱 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
Synonym: 外
Antonyms: 內 裏
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 臱 [ mián ]
heisig_chinese_memo: On the long road to the pinnacle you use your compass to make sure you're in the right direction and there are many potholes which make the pinnacle difficult to get to.  When you get close to the border you'll smell that delicious food from the pinnacle with your nose.
myStory: указывать туда где домашний огонь и дым в очаге方было добавлено чтобы указывать оригинальное
Ru_trainchinese:
biān: (сущ) сторона, край, предел, граница, кромка


biān: (нареч) в то же время, одновременно, и вместе с тем
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: China doesn't need people power along the road at the border because of the Great Wall.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription from "辵" from "自" from " former " from "方", "自" is the original text of " nasal ", the ancient pronunciation is the same as " nasal ", "自" and " former " are both sides "The sound note (Zhang Shichao). " Fang " means side by side. The original meaning of " side " is side.

The ancient " fang " and " byside " pass the holiday, "Yi Li. "Big Shooting Ceremony" "Left and Right" Zheng Xuan's Note: "Fang, also out of the side." (Refer to Dingshan)

Jinwen means borders and remote areas. Da Yu Ding: "I heard that Yin Shu (falling) orders (destinations), Yu (only) Yin Bianhou, Tian (Dian) Xi (and) Yin Zheng Baipi, and the rate was at You (wine)." It means I am Hearing that the fate of the Yin dynasty fell, the princes and officials in the remote areas of the Yin dynasty all indulged in alcohol. It is also used as a place name, Sanshi Pan: "As for the Bianliu".

" Bian " Xiao Zhuan made " 𨘢 ", "Shuowen": "𨘢, you can go down the cliff. From the sound of 𦤝."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscriptions from "辵" from "自" from " former " from " fang ", "自" is the first text of " nasal ", the ancient pronunciation is the same as " nasal ", "自" and " former " are both " side " "The sound note (Zhang Shichao). From " fang " has the meaning of side. The original meaning of " side " is side.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「辵」從「自」從「丙」從「方」，「自」是「鼻」的初文，古音與「鼻」相同，「自」、「丙」都是「邊」的聲符(張世超)。從「方」有旁邊之意。「邊」的本義是旁邊。



　　古「方」、「旁」通假，《儀禮．大射禮》「左右曰方」鄭玄注：「方，出旁也。」(參丁山)



　　金文表示邊境、邊遠地區。大盂鼎：「我聞殷述(墜)令(命)，隹(唯)殷邊侯、田(甸)雩(與)殷正百辟，率肆于酉(酒)。」意思是說我聽聞殷朝墜喪天命，殷朝邊遠地區的諸侯和朝中的官員都沉湎於酒。又用作地名，散氏盤：「至于邊柳」。



　　「邊」小篆作「𨘢」，《說文》：「𨘢，行垂崖也。从辵𦤝聲。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「辵」從「自」從「丙」從「方」，「自」是「鼻」的初文，古音與「鼻」相同，「自」、「丙」都是「邊」的聲符(張世超)。從「方」有旁邊之意。「邊」的本義是旁邊。

①物體的周圍部分，外緣：邊緣。邊沿。
②國家或地區交界處：邊疆。邊界。邊防。邊境。邊陲(邊境)。
③幾何學上指夾成角或圍成多角形的直線：等邊三角形。
④旁側，近旁：身邊。邊鋒。
⑤方面：邊幹(gàn)邊學。
⑥表示方位：上邊。外邊。
⑦姓氏。

" Fang" means side by side. The original meaning of " side" is side. The ancient " fang" and " byside" pass the holiday, "Yi Li. "Big Shooting Ceremony" "Left and Right" Zheng Xuan's Note: "Fang, also out of the side." (Refer to Dingshan) Jinwen means borders and remote areas. Da Yu Ding: "I heard that Yin Shu (falling) orders (destinations), Yu (only) Yin Bianhou, Tian (Dian) Xi (and) Yin Zheng Baipi, and the rate was at You (wine)." It means I am Hearing that the fate of the Yin dynasty fell, the princes and officials in the remote areas of the Yin dynasty all indulged in alcohol. It is also used as a place name, Sanshi Pan: "As for the Bianliu". " Bian" Xiao Zhuan made " 𨘢", "Shuowen": "𨘢, you can go down the cliff. From the sound of 𦤝."

邊字的基本解释

邊
biān
见“边”。

邊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》布玄切，平先，幫。］
亦作“1”。“边1”的繁体字。亦作“邉1”。
(1)物体的四侧，边缘。
(2)边境；边界。
(3)止境；尽头。
(4)接近；临近。
(5)偏倚；倾斜。
(6)旁边；附近。
(7)偏旁。
(8)指事物的部分、方面。
(9)中；范围内。
(10)临近某个时候。
(11)边区的省称。
(12)方位词的后缀。
(13)几个“邊”字分别用在动词前面，表示动作同时进行。
(14)数学名词。几何图形上夹成角或围成多角形的直线。
(15)姓。汉有边韶。

邊字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　邊； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1267第13
〔古文〕?【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】??眠切，音編。【玉篇】畔也，邊境也。【禮·玉藻】其在邊邑。【註】邊邑，九州邊鄙之邑。【左傳·成十三年】蕩搖我邊疆。　又【正韻】旁近也。【前漢·高帝紀】齊邊楚。　又側也。【禮·檀弓】齊衰不以邊坐。【疏】喪服宜敬，起坐宜正，不可著齊衰而偏坐也。　又邊璋，半文飾也。【周禮·冬官考工記】邊璋七寸。　又姓。周大夫邊伯之後。南唐有邊鎬。《說文》作?。

考證：〔【左傳·成十三年】搖蕩我邊疆。〕　謹照原文搖蕩改蕩搖。
邊字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
邊字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
side
biān
See "side".
side
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biān］
["Guangyun" Buxuanqie, Pingxian, help. ]
Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "边1". Also known as "Xiao 1".
(1) The four sides and edges of the object.
(2) Border; border.
(3) End; End.
(4) Approaching; approaching.
(5) Bias; tilt.
(6) Next to; nearby.
(7) Radicals.
(8) Refers to the parts and aspects of things.
(9) Medium; within range.
(10) Sometime is approaching.
(11) The provincial name of the border area.
(12) Suffixes of locality words.
(13) Several "Bian" characters are used in front of verbs to indicate simultaneous actions.
(14) Mathematical terms. A straight line that forms an angle or a polygonal shape on a geometric figure.
(15) Last name. Han has Bian Shao.
side
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　bian; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1267, 13
[Ancient text]? [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]?? Mianqie, phonetic editing. [Jade articles] Banks and borders. 【Li·Yuzao】It's in Bianyi. [Note] Bianyi, the town of Bianbei in Kyushu. [Zuo Zhuan·Thirteen Years] Shake my frontier.　[Zheng Yun] Next to it. [Former Han · Gao Di Ji] Qi Bian Chu.　It's also sideways. [Li·Tan Gong] Qi declines not to sit on the side. 【Sparse】Mourning clothes should be respected, and sit upright, not to sit on the side.　Bianzhang again, with half-text decorations. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Bian Zhang Qi Cun.　Another last name. After Doctor Zhou Bian Bo. There is a side pick in the Southern Tang Dynasty. "Said Wen" written?. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Thirteen Years] Shake my frontier. 〕 　 I would like to sway according to the original text.
